sentence.Network_en: They see nothing but gorgeousness and splendour.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们所看到的只是豪华和奢侈的场面.

sentence.Network_en: The sun has his simple rode of light. The clouds are decked with gorgeousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳只穿一件朴素的光衣, 白云却披了灿烂的裙裾.

sentence.Network_en: This style of pajamas for women gives people a feeling of gorgeousness, sexiness and youthfulness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种女式睡衣,带给人华丽 、 性感和年轻的感觉.

auth_sentence.content: It contains many moments of unquestionable gorgeousness.
